dict.acceptation: 准许进入；承认；坦白；入场费；

sent.orig: Free admission by ticket. One ticket for admission of one person only, first come first served.
sent.trans: 凭票免费入场，每人一票，名额有限，先到先得。

sent.orig: Admission is a non-cash payment through banks and other financial payment system to admission.
sent.trans: 非现金收付费是指通过银行等资金支付系统收付费。

sent.orig: Conclusions-Both admission and post admission hyperglycemia predict 30-day death in AMI patients.
sent.trans: 结论-在AMI中，入院时和入院后高血糖均可预测30天内的高死亡率。

sent.orig: By fusing the two admission methods, Taiji Daoism has furnished its admission with flexibility and universality.
sent.trans: 太极道学融合了两种采信方式，使采信具有灵活性和普适性。

sent.orig: How abundance is admission for the concert? Admission free.
sent.trans: 这场音乐会的门票要多少钱？非赢利性入场。
